markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 36 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 [Sir Fredero Sinnet](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2385) **Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 88 **Perception** +15 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +20, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +18, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +20, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +17, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +18 **Str** +4 **Dex** +2 **Con** +4 **Int** +1 **Wis** +0 **Cha** +3 **Items** _+1 [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_, [moderate healing potions](/Equipment.aspx?ID=186) (3), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [thundering](/Equipment.aspx?ID=306) [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)_, _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75)_, [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) --- **AC** 28 **Fort** +21 **Ref** +17 **Will** +15 **HP** 160 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**Quick Block** Sir Fredero gains an additional reaction at the start of each of his turns that he can use only to perform a Shield Block.
**[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32)**
**Stubborn Conviction** **Frequency** once per round; **Trigger** Sir Fredero fails (but doesn't critically fail) a saving throw against a control or [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effect; **Effect** Sir Fredero rerolls the failed saving throw. He must take the result of this second roll, even if it is worse than the initial failure. --- **Speed** 20 feet **Melee** _longsword_ +20 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 2d8+10 slashing plus 1d6 sonic **Ranged** _composite shortbow_ +18 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 2d6+10 piercing
name: Sir Fredero Sinnet
